lines.text: Mademoiselle - will you think me too bold - if I ask to see your face?
How strange - and how wonderful - this meeting! It can't be just accident - chance...
Tell me you are free to love me.
There is a strange fear in my heart - of losing you. Won't you tell me your name - ?
Remember this of me - there were tears in my eyes when I said - 'I love you!'
If I lied - it was because I love you...
To the Temptress - who asks for nothing - but takes all a man can give - and more!
The Argentine! Far from the artificial life of the old world - land of Men - and the work of Men! - The Argentine!
This is not a country for European women! Why did you bring your wife?
God makes men - and women makes fools!
Are these not the same hands you kissed in Paris - ? - are these not the same lips?
Men from the dam to make a fiesta for the Marquise! - Men - Men - what are men for - if not to amuse a woman!
May I say goodbye - to - to her?
In hell - would you offer prayers to the devil?
I am yours - do what you will with me.
Woman - born to rule the world!
Dear God - why can't You give me back the past - to do better with - ?
The Señora will soon be down - she is undressing.
Spring - and the nights of Paris, Throb with love and desire.
